snippet: A United Nations report says the number of refugees fleeing the war in the Democratic Republic of Congo swelled by more than 350,000 in the past few months.
abstract: United Nations report says number of refugees fleeing the war in the Democratic Republic of Congo swelled by more than 360,000 in just a few months as fighting escalated; action  pushes the number or people uprooted in the long-running conflict to three million.
